item.title: [模板] 对拍程序
item.description: Title from os import system tc=0 while True: system("python data.py > data.in") system("std.exe < data.in > std.out") system("my.exe < data.in > my.out") # system("diff std.out my.out > diff.out"): if system("fc std.out my.out > diff.out"): print("WA") break else: tc += 1 print("AC #%d"%tc) print("-------------------- data.in --------------------") # system("cat data.in") system("type data.in") print("-------------------- std.out --------------------") system("type std.out") print("-------------------- my.out ---------------------") system("type my.out") #include <bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; int main() { int tc=0; while(1) { system("data.exe > data.in"); // system("python data.py > data.in"); system("std.exe < data.in > std.out"); system("my.exe < data.in > my.out"); // system("diff std.out my.out > diff.out"): if(system("fc std.out my.out >

item.title: [模板][数据结构] 树状数组 Binary Index Tree/Fenwick Tree
item.description: 树状数组 Binary Index Tree/Fenwick Tree 1d 单点修改，区间询问 // id 0~n-1 template<typename T,size_t M,typename OpPlus=plus<T>,typename OpMinus=minus<T>> struct BIT { static int lowbit(int x) { return x&(-x); } T tree[M+1]; // tree[i] -> [i-lowbit(i)+1,i] T tmp[M+1]; OpPlus opp; OpMinus opm; int n; void init(int n_) { n=n_; for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) tree[i]=T(0); } void init(int n_,T[] v) { n=n_; tmp[0]=T(0); for(int i=0;i<n;i++) tmp[i+1]=opp(tmp[i],v[i]); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) tree[i]=opm(tmp[i],tmp[i-lowbit(i)]); // for(int i=0;i<n;i++) add(i,v[i]); } void add(int p,T V) { for(p=p+1;p<=n;p+=lowbit(p)) tree[i]=opp(tree[i],V); } T sum(int p) { T ans(0); for(p=p+1;p;p-=lowbit(p)) ans=opp(ans,tree[p]); return ans; } T sum(int l,int

item.title: [模板] 计时 Timing
item.description: 计时 Timing chrono class Timing { private: typedef chrono::time_point<std::chrono::high_resolution_clock> TP; TP current_time() { return chrono::high_resolution_clock::now(); } TP st,ed; public: void start() { st=current_time(); } void end() { ed=current_time(); } void print() { cout<<chrono::duration_cast<chrono::microseconds>(ed-st).count() <<"ms\n"; } }timing;
